description.compact: This Class extends the CI_controller and is used to display static pages in the site.

docblock.description: The page as a variable is passed in the URL and the corrisponding view is routed and displayed to the user.

description.compact: This function will load the corrisponding view along with the page header and footer.

param.description: Name of a page in the site.
